players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "Charlie, any thoughts on Diana's death? Alice, why are you so quiet?"
Charlie: "Everyone, I investigated Alice last night and discovered she is the mafioso. We need to vote to arrest Alice today."
Bob: "Charlie, your claim seems convenient. If you were the detective, you'd likely be targeted by the mafia, yet you're still here. Alice, do you have any defense?"
Charlie: "Bob, Alice's silence is telling. If I were the mafia, I would have tried to deflect suspicion by now. Let's make the right choice and arrest Alice."
